function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Dynamic nature of space planning due to COVID-19 pandemic","Impact":"Inconsistent physical distancing requirements and SOPs may lead to increased risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Regularly updated and well-informed SOPs, clear communication of physical distancing requirements","Technologies":"Digital surveillance, AI algorithms for crowd management","People":"Public in social spaces, office workers, customers in public areas","Owner":"Public health authorities, facility managers, business owners"},{"Description":"Manually intervened, ad-hoc solutions for space planning","Impact":"Ineffective or inconsistent solutions may increase the risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implementing standardized and evidence-based space planning solutions, regular review and update of interventions","Technologies":"Mobile apps for space optimization, crowd management software, digital communication platforms","People":"Public in social spaces, office workers, customers in public areas","Owner":"Facility managers, business owners, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Computer-based solutions for COVID-19 management","Impact":"Reliance on technology without considering behavioral and environmental factors may lead to ineffective control of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Integrated approach including behavioral and environmental factors, regular monitoring and updating of technology-based solutions","Technologies":"Deep learning for object and people detection, video surveillance systems, crowd analytics software","People":"Public in social spaces, office workers, customers in public areas","Owner":"Public health authorities, facility managers, technology developers"}]}
